channel.title: The Beers on Drinktober 2020
channel.description: Recent content in The Beers on Drinktober 2020

item.title: So tired. So sober.
item.description: Sooooooo tired and I have no energy! Went to give blood Today and itâ€™s the first time itâ€™s not been a great excuse to get drunk quicker! Overall Iâ€™m feeling better not drinking but Iâ€™m struggling to stay awake tonight: I reckon one vodka would currently knock me out anyway so I guess Viva le Sober! Also on the subject of unconventional tattoos…. Iâ€™ve booked one with all the money I saved not drinking ğŸ˜‚

item.title: I am a machine
item.description: Hola! Works been stressful and last night I struggled a lot to not drink. Butttttt, today I got weighed and Iâ€™ve lost 6lbs, taking my total to 16lbs which made me feel better! Went walking and managed 8.2 miles today, meaning I donâ€™t fancy a drink at all tonight! Please take a moment to donate if you can, my legs might drop off from todayâ€™s wandering so a cheeky fiver whilst Iâ€™m infirm would be ğŸ‘Œ

item.title: Please God give me a gin.
item.description: Jesus Christ I wanted a drink tonight!! I could on practically taste it. I spent a moment gazing at the prosecco at my corner shop waving my bank card and probably looked a bit not ok. Frustrating day of stupid Expensive internet Dropping out and losing my work, followed by a 2 hour rowing with a smart plug which wouldnâ€™t work and I would probably kill your nan for a drink about now.

item.title: Well Jesus Christ
item.description: Well, that was a few days. Sent to work from home because Iâ€™ve developed a bizarre hives like rash type affair EVERYWHERE….. which apparently is a covid sign. Also, Iâ€™ve developed random sporadic vomiting today, WITHOUT EVEN HAVING AN ALCOHOL. Wtf?!! So I am currently very itchy, a bit nauseous, and with a headache from 11 and a half hours on zoom meeting, and a little drink would be bloody fantastic.

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: Gee, Jonny, what are we going to do tonight? Same thing we do every night - DÌƒÍ¦Ì’Í¨Ì…ÍŠÍ€Í¢Í…Ì—Í–Í–Í“Ì¹ÍRÌšÍ‚ÌµÍÍ•Ì Ì˜IÌŠÌ‘ÍÍ†Í§ÍÌÌ‰Ì½Ì²Ì°Í‰NÍ­ÌÍ¨Í­Ì”Í‘Ì½Í¢Ì¶ÍÌ¼Ì»Ì©KÍ—Ì†Í„Í«Ì‰ÌŒÍ†Ì´Ì¶Í¢Ì¼Ì°Í“Í“Ì² Ì‰Í­Ì‚Í’ÍÍˆÍˆÍ“Í™BÌƒÌ‘Í­Ì€ÍªÍ¯ÍªÍ¦Ì›ÍÍ¢Ì¬ÌªÍ”Ì»Ì–EÍ‹Í©Í€Ì·Ì•Ì²Ì˜ÌEÍƒÌÍ­Ì“Í„ÌÌ¾Í«ÌµÒ‰Ì›Ì­Í™Ì©ÍRÌÌÌ“Ì‰ÍªÌ®Íˆ ÌšÍ†Ì¿ÍªÍ§ÍŒÌ‰ÍÍˆÌªÌ¬Ì˜ÍÌ£Ì¬Ì©AÍ¨Ì–Ì–NÍ¬Ì„ÌÌÌÍªÌ¸Í‰ÌºÍ•Ì¥Ì«DÍ¦Í¬Í€ÌºÌÌªÌ©Í Í›Í‹Í¥ÌÌ¨Ì¡ÍˆÌ²ÍˆÌ¤ÌHÌ¾Í®Ì‚ÍœÍ Ì»ÌªÌ®ÌªÌÌ¹Í‡Í…AÌ”Ì†Ì½ÌŠÍ„Ì§Ì¸Ì™Ì®Ì¥ÌŸÌ­Í…IÌ‰Ì„Ì‹Ì¿Í®Í¨Ì§Í€Ì¦Í•Í‡Í•LÍÌ‚Ì“Í‘ÍœÍ Ì Ì¹Ì£Ì—Ì°ÌŸÍ‰ Í¯ÍƒÌÌ¨Ì ÍˆÍ‡Ì«ÍˆÌ¼Ì—SÍ¥Í¥Ì„Í©Í¤Ì”ÌŒÌ·Ì¼Í…Ì¯Ì±AÍ‚ÍÍ¬ÍŠÌšÍ©Í‚Í Ò‰Í”ÌœÍ•Í”Ì»ÌÍÍ–TÌ’Ì†Ì•Ì£Ì¥AÌÌ‰Í‹Í¥Í¥Ì„ÍŒÌ‘ÍƒÍÌ­ÌÌ£NÍ©Ì‹ÌÍÍ‘Í¥Ì†Í«Í¢ÍœÌ˜Ì®Ì±Ì–Ì–ÌªÌÍšÌ¯!Í¦ÌÌ‹Ì¾Ò‰Ì´Í“ We’ve reached once again, the final night of #Drinktober -Drinkowe’en is here! Seemed only right to see the end with the most evil beer I could lay my hands on… If you’ve enjoyed my ridiculous antics all month, why not click on the link over there -> (or down below if you’re on mobile) and donate a few bob for the real hero of Drinktober.
